data.text: @byroncclark Shame, many NGO's are paying good money for the work you do.

@GuageTheorist @justsaynotorats @byroncclark Unlike an intellectual giant like you who ignores sound public health advice in favour of sick pranksters like Jim and Ron Watkins. You should give up Qanon it was a hoax and concentrate on your mental health.Not everyone  is a corrupt corporate employee. Blocking you...
@Olivefarmer @justsaynotorats @byroncclark I thought it was only the corporate press fell for that prank, seems there a plenty more intellectually challenged out there.
@GuageTheorist I'm funded my supporters on Patreon and Ko-fi, some of the articles I write I get paid for. I don't make enough from those sources to not have to still work a day job
@justsaynotorats @GuageTheorist @byroncclark I heard @GuageTheorist works for the Queen of Canada her majesty Romana Didulo and has a tin foil lined purple tent ....
@GuageTheorist @byroncclark You could always "do your own research" and hover over his name which will pop up his Patreon and Ko-fi links...
@byroncclark @HenryGLaws And Kelvyn Alp, gosh what company they keep aye

@byroncclark @PakehaAotearoan I edited out the word "Māori" from the article because Kelvin Alps right-wing white supremacist organization had nothing to do with Māori & the herald knew that he only referenced Māori law so every time the media mentioned him it said "māori military declared war on govt" 🤬
@byroncclark @LexRegina72 She’s not the sharpest knife in the drawer unfortunately
@byroncclark Oh all good, I had only thought you might already know the answer. Your tireless work is much needed in these wretched times, don't take on any extra tasks just on my behalf
